Description Lists

@nycopportunity/pattern-elements/src/elements/description-lists

Active
Owner
The Mayor's Office of Information Privacy
Partner Agencies

Agreement History

  <dt>
    <b>Status</b>
  </dt>
  <dd>Active</dd>
  <dt>
    <b>Owner</b>
  </dt>
  <dd>The Mayor's Office of Information Privacy</dd>
  <dt>
    <b>Partner Agencies</b>
  </dt>
  <dd>Department of Homeless Services, Human Resources Administration, Administration for Child Services</dd>
  <dt>
    <b>Data Coverage</b>
  </dt>
  <dd>1/9/2010 - Current</dd>
  <dt>
    <b>Agreement History</b>
  </dt>
  <dd>1/9/2010 - Current</dd>
</dl>

The Description List is a group of terms and their corresponding definitions. The display of description lists is similar to tables but reserved for non-tabular content that fits into a two column display with a short term label in the first column and a long form description of the term in the second column.
